page.title: 04The environment
page.content: The area of the survey is mostly agricultural land. The air is usually very clean though from time to time there is a white dust in the air.There is also often the sound of blasting in the air.The village of Croft also has a large number of trucks passing through it.All these particular things happen because of the quarry in Croft.The river Soar passes through Croft so too do many streams.From time to time there is flooding especially in the winter.This may the reason why there is more pasture land in the south of the area.The M69 motorway has taken much of the traffic that once used the Fosse Way.This has made the farms beside the motorway very noisy.There ios very little woodland in the area .However there is some dividing the fields,beside the railway ,but mostly beside the streams .
